title: Lake Bell 🙏
description:
Lake Bell (Harley Quinn) talks to Justin about her directorial debut at Sundance, her experience creating Bless This Mess with Liz Meriwether, and Justin gets a peak into quarantine parenting when Lake’s kids make adorable appearances! 


Support us by supporting our sponsors!
